typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string,
		Column_7 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> source1
source1 split(year==1990,
	ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
	disjoint: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(, , )
